parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Excuse me exactly who are you? How did you get into the castle? The guards - \|\|\^
- have been instructed not to let anyone in. \|\|\^
Oh, erm I came through the caves underneath the castle. \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
You did what? Your rather strange, aren’t you? It's pretty obvious you're - \|\|\^
- not from around here. So, what is it that brings you to Luthania moreover - \|\|\^
I came to ensure the safety of my family as I had recieved word that they - \|\|\^
In Luthania? Nonsense Luthania is an extremely safe place to be. So what - \|\|\^
The Haffendens. My sister Lady Idelle is supposed to be married to the - \|\|\^
Oh dear, you’re the younger brother. I take it you have heard about your - \|\|\^
- mother? I am really sorry about it however the situation was out of - \|\|\^
- my hands. The King won’t listen to anyone as of late. Not even me. I'm - \|\|\^
- his wife and I don’t know how to help him. \|\|\^
Why yes, I am. But we can skip the formalities for now. I will help you - \|\|\^
- save what is left of your family. Your mother didn’t deserve - \|\|\^
- what happened to her. I can’t imagine what she would have felt - \|\|\^
- knowing that she had fled one disaster for another. To know her children - \|\|\^
- were scattered across the realm, unsafe. I just wish I could have done - \|\|\^
- more to help her. Unfortunately, I do not know the location of your sister - \|\|\^
- Leya she disappeared when the King started acting up. I fear she may have - \|\|\^
- been killed along with your mother. I am ashamed of what we have caused. - \|\|\^
- However, your sister Idelle is alive for now, she’s being kept in the dungeons. - \|\|\^
- However, she has been refusing to eat since she received the news about your - \|\|\^
- mother's death. My son Dormato is locked in dungeons as well you need to - \|\|\^
- save him he is the heir to the throne. My husband locked our baby down - \|\|\^
- there, it shows how far gone he is. I will not forgive him for that. \|\|\^
Oh, ok well thank you for your help. \|\|\^
I haven’t finished yet! You don’t have a clue as to where the dungeons are! \|\|\^
Oh yeah, so where are they then? \|\|\^
The dungeons are located on the north-western side of the market. I will - \|\|\^
- notify the guards to let you pass through the main gates so that you - \|\|\^
- don’t have to travel through the caves again. Please hurry up and save them. - \|\|\^
- I hope we can make things right between our families. \|\|\^
You obtained Queen Rosa's Entry in the Journal.

Ah, your sister and I differ in our approaches to handling our current situation. - \|\|\^
- I heard she asked you to handle it? \|\|\^
Yes, she did. I have done what she asked so what’s the issue? \|\|\^
I’m happy with what you have accomplished, but it is not enough. Not  - \|\|\^
- enough to keep the people happy and content. Too much changed in too little - \|\|\^
- a time for them just to accept it lying down. It will take more than just - \|\|\^
- dressing up as a commoner to win their support back. \|\|\^
That makes sense. We will have to look into other ways to keep the support. \|\|\^
Your sister is now the Queen. She needs to realise this isn’t a game - \|\|\^
- and start making the difficult decisions people in positions of power - \|\|\^
- sometimes have to make. It’s never easy to have to decide who lives or dies, - \|\|\^
- who eats who starves and all that but it has to be decided either way. \|\|\^
I will speak to Idelle but the real issue is Dormato. \|\|\^
You think I don’t know that? Do you think as his mother, I don’t notice - \|\|\^
- these things? I realise that him refusing to visit the towns has hurt our - \|\|\^
- reputation. I realise that he needs to accept that his father is dead and - \|\|\^
- that he needs to get up and rule. But don’t forget that the fact that he - \|\|\^
- didn’t execute you for killing Luther hurt our reputation the most. It will - \|\|\^
- take some time for him to come around, in the meantime you, your sister and - \|\|\^
- I will do our best to help him. I know that he listens to your sister when  - \|\|\^
- they’re together so he’s not completely lost. \|\|\^
Together? How would you know that? \|\|\^
Oh come on, do we have to pretend that I don’t have ears throughout - \|\|\^
Good. I wouldn’t need them as much if your sister and I could see eye to - \|\|\^
Like I said I will speak to her. \|\|\^
Good. Hopefully, we can put all of this to rest. \|\|\^

I was just seeing if you were alright? \|\|\^
Oh, I’m fine... Of course, I’m not. The tides have turned, I fear this may be it for us. - \|\|\^
- I fear Roswell will triumph over us and forge his new world in our - \|\|\^
- absence. I remember the fall of Odaria, oh how it plays in my mind. - \|\|\^
- It wasn’t pretty. The city was destroyed and practically desolate by the time - \|\|\^
- the fighting was over. Father’s turned on their sons, brothers on brothers as - \|\|\^
- the noble houses began to fight and tear each other down. Armies came - \|\|\^
- in waves each taking a piece of Odaria with them when they left. \|\|\^
It sounds like a horrible time with everyone turning on each other. \|\|\^
That’s just the start. Women and children were killed, raped and stolen in - \|\|\^
- the same streets they called home. It was literally hell on earth. \|\|\^
Lot’s more happened but I won’t go into the details now. My point was that - \|\|\^
- something similar will take place if we lose. If that happens I don’t intend - \|\|\^
- to be around when that takes place. \|\|\^
I have already arranged for my guards to kill me should you lose. I won’t be - \|\|\^
- passed around like an animal, I will go with my dignity intact. Like a - \|\|\^
Hopefully. But if it does I want to say thank you. \|\|\^
For helping me, my family and my kingdom. You certainly don’t look like much - \|\|\^
- but you do a lot. I guess it’s true that looks can be deceiving. \|\|\^
- they’re together so he’s not completely lost. \|\|\^
You sent for me and the other ladies? \|\|\^
Yes, we should all stick together during these troubling moments. Cedric that  - \|\|\^
- bell means you need to go. It’s time. \|\|\^
You too. Try not to get killed. \|\|\^
Hours from now someone will walk through those doors. This battle will - \|\|\^
And what are you going to do if it’s Roswell’s army? \|\|\^
Don’t worry dear, I have already made arrangements for such an event. \|\|\^
I want to know what these arrangements are? \|\|\^
It’s best if you don’t know. \|\|\^
I am the Queen, I demand to know! \|\|\^
Very well, my guards have been instructed to kill us should my son lose - \|\|\^
Pardon? Are you out of your mind? You plan to kill us all?! \|\|\^
Absolutely not. That will not happen. Ladies don’t be scared. She’s just - \|\|\^
Oh yes, it will. You may now be the Queen but have you ever lived through a - \|\|\^
Exactly. You are not prepared and don’t know what to do. However I do, - \|\|\^
- I don’t intend on letting us suffer the same fate as those in the city. - \|\|\^
- You’re pregnant so you shouldn’t be stressing yourself over this. I have - \|\|\^
- prepared a corner for you will all you need. Your ladies will tend to you. \|\|\^
Oh and before you have a change of heart. Guards! \|\|\^
What are you doing?! Are you stupid?! \|\|\^
